thread.title: BRIEF-Anna Kowalska's stake in BPX decreases after capital increase
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Anna Kowalska's stake in BPX decreases after capital increase | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Anna Kowalska's stake in BPX decreases after capital increase
text:
Sept 4 BPX SA :
* Anna Kowalska's stake in company decreases to 1.31 pct from 7.47 pct after capital increase
* The number of shares owned by Kowalska has not changed and totals 266,023 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
